item.title: My favorite Kasa Smart Plug is 42% off for Prime Day üîå
item.description: I don't think I have asupersmart home, but I have a few hacks that make it so much more streamlined. My biggest shoutout goes to theKasa Smart Plug. Seriously, these clever little things do basic tasks for me, like turning on my table lamps or holiday lights in the winter!

item.title: Prime Day has 20% off the crazy popular Coop adjustable pillows
item.description: Don't overcomplicate yoursleep routine; sometimes the best way to achieve a better night's rest is by swapping in a new set of sheets or adding a new pillow to your bedroom setup. And withAmazon's Prime Day 2025 salehappening now throughFriday, July 11, this week is the perfect time to stock up and save on coveted sleep accessories at a fraction of their usual cost‚Äîincluding best-sellers from Coop Sleep.

item.title: Where does Florida stand on its latest mass immigration‚Ä¶
item.description: So far, more than 1,000 migrants have been detained under the state‚Äôs aggressive‚ÄúOperation Tidal Wave,‚Äùa crackdown that officials say could become a model for federal immigration enforcement. The operation gained traction in May after a joint ICE raid led to over 100 arrests at construction sites in Tallahassee.
